System.M_CUSTR001: SELECT M.CUSTR_CODE, RTRIM(M.CUST1_NAME) || ' ' || RTRIM(M.CUST2_NAME) AS CUST_NAME, M.CUST_FLG, M.SHIP_FLG, M.SUPP_FLG, M.CUST1_NAME, M.CUST2_NAME, M.CUST_RNAME, M.CUST_KANA, M.CUST_TNAME, M.MAILNO, M.ADRESS1, M.ADRESS2, M.ADRESS3, M.TELNO, M.FAXNO, M.MAILADR, M.URLADRS, M.CUSTC_NAME, M.USE_FLG, M.OLD_CODE, M.ADD_USER, M.ADD_DATE, M.LASTUP_USER, M.LASTUP_DATE FROM M_CUSTR AS M $WHERE
System.M_CUSTR002: SELECT M.CUSTR_CODE, M.CUST1_NAME, M.USE_FLG FROM M_CUSTR AS M $WHERE
System.M_CUSTR003: INSERT INTO M_CUSTR( CUSTR_CODE, CUST_KANA, CUST1_NAME, CUST2_NAME, CUST_RNAME, CUST_TNAME, MAILNO, ADRESS1, ADRESS2, ADRESS3, TELNO, FAXNO, MAILADR, URLADRS, CUSTC_NAME, OLD_CODE, SEARCHIDX, USE_FLG, ADD_USER, ADD_PC, ADD_DATE, ADD_TIME, LASTUP_USER, LASTUP_PC, LASTUP_DATE, LASTUP_TIME ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
System.M_CUSTR004: UPDATE M_CUSTR SET CUST1_NAME = ?, CUST2_NAME = ?, CUST_RNAME = ?, CUST_KANA = ?, CUST_TNAME = ?, MAILNO = ?, ADRESS1 = ?, ADRESS2 = ?, ADRESS3 = ?, TELNO = ?, FAXNO = ?, MAILADR = ?, URLADRS = ?, CUSTC_NAME = ?, OLD_CODE = ?, SEARCHIDX = ?, USE_FLG = ?, LASTUP_USER = ?, LASTUP_PC = ?, LASTUP_DATE = ?, LASTUP_TIME = ? WHERE CUSTR_CODE = ?
System.M_CUSTR006: SELECT M.CUSTR_CODE FROM M_CUSTR AS M ORDER BY M.CUSTR_CODE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
System.M_CUSTR007: SELECT M.CUSTR_CODE, M.CUST_RNAME, M.USE_FLG , M.CUST_KANA FROM M_CUSTR AS M $WHERE
System.M_CUSTR008: SELECT M.CUSTR_CODE, M.CUST_RNAME, M.USE_FLG , M.CUST_KANA FROM M_CUSTR AS M $WHERE
System.M_CUSTR009: SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(M_CUSTR.CUST1_NAME),'') || ' ' || COALESCE(RTRIM(M_CUSTR.CUST2_NAME),'') FROM M_CUST AS M LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR ON M.CUST_CODE = M_CUSTR.CUSTR_CODE $WHERE
System.M_CUSTR011: SELECT RTRIM(M.CUSTR_CODE) AS CUSTR_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(M.CUST1_NAME),'') || ' ' || COALESCE(RTRIM(M.CUST2_NAME),'') AS CUSTR_NAME, RTRIM(M.CUST_KANA) AS CUST_KANA, RTRIM(M.CUST_RNAME) AS CUST_RNAME FROM M_CUSTR AS M $WHERE
System.M_CUSTR500: SELECT M.CUSTR_CODE, RTRIM(M.CUST1_NAME) + ' ' + RTRIM(M.CUST2_NAME) AS CUST_NAME, M.CUST_FLG, M.SHIP_FLG, M.SUPP_FLG, M.CUST1_NAME, M.CUST2_NAME, M.CUST_RNAME, M.CUST_KANA, M.CUST_TNAME, M.MAILNO, M.ADRESS1, M.ADRESS2, M.ADRESS3, M.TELNO, M.FAXNO, M.MAILADR, M.URLADRS, M.CUSTC_NAME, M.USE_FLG, M.OLD_CODE, M.ADD_USER, M.ADD_DATE, M.LASTUP_USER, M.LASTUP_DATE FROM M_CUSTR AS M WHERE M.CUSTR_CODE = ?
System.M_CUSTR501: SELECT M.CUSTR_CODE, RTRIM(M.CUST1_NAME) + ' ' + RTRIM(M.CUST2_NAME) AS CUST_NAME, M.CUST_FLG, M.SHIP_FLG, M.SUPP_FLG, M.CUST1_NAME, M.CUST2_NAME, M.CUST_RNAME, M.CUST_KANA, M.CUST_TNAME, M.MAILNO, M.ADRESS1, M.ADRESS2, M.ADRESS3, M.TELNO, M.FAXNO, M.MAILADR, M.URLADRS, M.CUSTC_NAME, M.USE_FLG, M.OLD_CODE, M.ADD_USER, M.ADD_PC, M.ADD_DATE, M.ADD_TIME, M.LASTUP_USER, M.LASTUP_PC, M.LASTUP_DATE, M.LASTUP_TIME, M.SEARCHIDX FROM M_CUSTR AS M
System.M_CUSTR502: SELECT M.CUSTR_CODE, RTRIM(M.CUST1_NAME) + ' ' + RTRIM(M.CUST2_NAME) AS CUST_NAME, M.CUST_FLG, M.SHIP_FLG, M.SUPP_FLG, M.CUST1_NAME, M.CUST2_NAME, M.CUST_RNAME, M.CUST_KANA, M.CUST_TNAME, M.MAILNO, M.ADRESS1, M.ADRESS2, M.ADRESS3, M.TELNO, M.FAXNO, M.MAILADR, M.URLADRS, M.CUSTC_NAME, M.USE_FLG, M.OLD_CODE, M.ADD_USER, M.ADD_PC, M.ADD_DATE, M.ADD_TIME, M.LASTUP_USER, M.LASTUP_PC, M.LASTUP_DATE, M.LASTUP_TIME, M.SEARCHIDX FROM M_CUSTR AS M ORDER BY CAST(CUSTR_CODE AS INT) DESC
System.M_CUSTR503:
SELECT COUNT(M.CUSTR_CODE)
FROM M_CUSTR AS M
System.M_CUSTR504: SELECT M.CUSTR_CODE, RTRIM(M.CUST1_NAME) + ' ' + RTRIM(M.CUST2_NAME) AS CUST_NAME, M.CUST_FLG, M.SHIP_FLG, M.SUPP_FLG, M.CUST1_NAME, M.CUST2_NAME, M.CUST_RNAME, M.CUST_KANA, M.CUST_TNAME, M.MAILNO, M.ADRESS1, M.ADRESS2, M.ADRESS3, M.TELNO, M.FAXNO, M.MAILADR, M.URLADRS, M.CUSTC_NAME, M.USE_FLG, M.OLD_CODE, M.ADD_USER, M.ADD_PC, M.ADD_DATE, M.ADD_TIME, M.LASTUP_USER, M.LASTUP_PC, M.LASTUP_DATE, M.LASTUP_TIME, M.SEARCHIDX FROM M_CUSTR AS M WHERE M.CUSTR_CODE = ?
System.M_CUSTR505: INSERT INTO M_CUSTR( CUSTR_CODE, CUST_FLG, SHIP_FLG, SUPP_FLG, CUST1_NAME, CUST2_NAME, CUST_RNAME, CUST_KANA, CUST_TNAME, MAILNO, ADRESS1, ADRESS2, ADRESS3, TELNO, FAXNO, MAILADR, URLADRS, CUSTC_NAME, USE_FLG, OLD_CODE, ADD_USER, ADD_PC, ADD_DATE, ADD_TIME, LASTUP_USER, LASTUP_PC, LASTUP_DATE, LASTUP_TIME, SEARCHIDX ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
System.M_CUSTR506: UPDATE M_CUSTR SET CUST_FLG= ?, SHIP_FLG= ?, SUPP_FLG= ?, CUST1_NAME= ?, CUST2_NAME= ?, CUST_RNAME= ?, CUST_KANA= ?, CUST_TNAME= ?, MAILNO= ?, ADRESS1= ?, ADRESS2= ?, ADRESS3= ?, TELNO= ?, FAXNO= ?, MAILADR= ?, URLADRS= ?, CUSTC_NAME= ?, USE_FLG= ?, OLD_CODE= ?, ADD_USER= ?, ADD_PC= ?, ADD_DATE= ?, ADD_TIME= ?, LASTUP_USER= ?, LASTUP_PC= ?, LASTUP_DATE= ?, LASTUP_TIME = ?, SEARCHIDX = ? WHERE CUSTR_CODE= ?
